div.h2: How do I configure distributed queues or topics
div.p: You don't need to explicitly configure distributed queues or topics as any queue or topic is automatically distributed across other brokers when the brokers are configured in either a store and forward network or a master/slave cluster.
So you just need to connect brokers together to form either

ul.li: a Store and Forward Network of Brokers, which means the messages travel from broker to broker until they reach a consumer; with each message being owned by a single broker at any point in time
a Master/Slave Cluster, which means all messages are replicated across each broker in the master/slave cluster
